attributes.action: Laugh out loud and scrap/replace the 2012 London Olympics Logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If ever an eyesore was evident, then the 2012 Olympic Logo is head and shoulders above anything else!

Taxpayers money really should be bettered handled. 

I'm sure you agree..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
